sub_topic: Probability of a certain type of political event occurring in a country
message_1: What is the probability of an election candidate winning by a margin of at least 10% in a country where the average voter turnout is 65% and the standard deviation is 5%?
message_2: To solve this problem, we need more information about the distribution of the votes between the candidates. The given information only tells us about the voter turnout, not the distribution of votes between the candidates. If you can provide the distribution of votes between the candidates or any other relevant information, we can help you calculate the probability.
